title: Topics in Public Health
description: Selected topics in the field of public health. Must be taken for a letter grade to be applied to the public health major. May be taken for credit up to three times. Prerequisites: PH 40 or FMPH 40. Additional prerequisites may be required at instructor’s discretion. Restricted enrollment to sophomore, junior, and senior standing. Department approval required. Renumbered from FMPH 191.
